titleStmt.title: SII 7.407: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 407. (A.R. No. 196 of 1901). ON THE NORTH WALL OF THE SAME SHRINE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
+ svasti śrī . pūmevi maruviya tiruppoṉmātu puṇarntu tiṭanmevu kalaimakaḷum nalamperutu ciṟantiruppa vicaiyamikum māmakaḷum velpuyattu viṟṟiruppa Icaivuṭaiya maṭamakaḷum Eṇṭicaitoṟum pukaḻ vaḷarppa pārmuḻutu paraṉiruvar paimpoṉ muṭi paṇintiṟaiñca kaḻinilamakaḷ paṭavam Iṉituvāḻa maṇam puṇarntu
cir vaḷarnta muṭi kavitteṉa cempo ṉaṇimuṭi cūṭi mallai ñālattup palluyurk kellām manuviṉ muṟaineṟi naṭātti Ellaiyi liṉpam yiyalvuṭaṉ ṉeyta Elmati veṇkuṭai niḻaṟṟac ceṅko locci vāḻi pallūḻi yāḻi naṭappac cempoṉ virasiṅ·nāsaṉattup puvaṉamuḻutuṭaiyāḷoṭu viṟṟiruntaruḷiya kopparakecaripaṟpamarāṉa tiripuvaṉac
cakkaravattikaḷ śrīkulottuṅkacoḻatevaṟku Añcāvatu jayaṅkaoṇṭacoḻamaṇḍalattu Ūṟṟukkāṭṭukkoṭṭattu tiyākavallivaḷanāṭṭut tiraiyaneriĀṉa kulaottuṅkacoḻaccaturvetimaṅkalattu tiruvaṉanticcaram Uṭaiyārukku Ivvūṟ cempiyaṉmātevicceriyil Irāccaḷūr cikāḻippiḷḷai Ulakuṭaiyanāya
ṉār kulottuṅ ñ ceyya Iṉnāyaṉārukkut tirumaṭaiviḷākam viṭṭa tirumukappaṭi tiripuvaṉaccakkaravattikaḷ koneriṉmaikaoṇṭān jayaṅkoṇṭacoḻamaṇṭalattu Ūṟṟukkāṭṭukkoṭṭattu tiyākavallivaḷanāṭṭu tiraiyaneri kulottuṅ
kacoḻaccatirvetimaṅkalattu Uṭaiyār tiruvaṉanticcuramuṭaiyār Ivvūrrile bra tu rājarājaniṉṟu vaṭakkunokki Iraṇṭāñ catiram maṟitiyāy Amaṉkavāykkālile Uṟṟa Aṟuttoṭṭi ner nālāṅ kaṇṇāṟ ṟuṟṟa ner Ācaṟitikku meṟkum tenpāṟ kellai mummuṭicoḻavāykkālāṉa vaṭakkil maṅkala
l niḷattu perrerik karaikkuk kiḻakkum vaṭapāṟkellai nālāṅ kaṇṇāṟ ṟācaṟutikkut teṟkkum Iṉṉān kellaiyuḷ ḷakappaṭṭa Uṇṇilam Oḻiviṉṟi namperāṟ tiruniṟṟuccoḻaṉ tirumaṭaiviḷākavmeṉṟut veṟu piṟittu Iṉṉāyanāṟku tirumaṭaiviḷākamāka Añcāvatumutal
Digital edition of SII 7.407 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
